testcase.name: Cogmento create deal details
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on login page.........................................passed When title of login page is Cogmento CRM....................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then User clicks on Login...................................................passed Then User is on homepage....................................................passed Then User clicks on deals link..............................................passed Then User clicks create button..............................................passed Then user enters deal details...............................................passed
